body: a good story arc in a hentai hits hard
The story was so nice I forgot to fap but the cheating part was very bad I skipped a couple of pages

That little cheating was a bit problematic but I like how the story handled it. She was upset and hurt and then confronted him and made sure there was no second time. Much better than Virgin na Kankei where MC is just constantly sleeping around behind his sweet wife’s back while being framed as a good guy.
i could have dealt without the NTR/ childhood friend.
This is actually so fucking beautiful holy shit. 10/10
Pretty good, got scared on the ntr tag cus it is a story arc but it wasnt that problematic in the story.
Thank god, I thought she would have cheated in the 6 months that he left, I'm glad nothing happened and it was a sweet happy ending!
Holy shit I read this such a long time ago and have been looking for this for ages
PT is great, but the white-out censoring is bad. Why, Action Comics, why?!
